(Serious look) Used to be, now them want to take us over, change us, into girls. Now I don't know about you all, but I plan on staying a guy and you should too. We are men! 12112.content:
Hypon turned to Eric after they were left alone and saw he was fiddling with his arm computer until a familiar voice rang out. "This doesn't seem right, Sonic is hiding more than he is saying. His heart beat increased noticeably when he referred to the females." Eric sighed at the holographic display of a fox not unlike Eric but purple and female, his robotic Artificial intelligence Cynthia, who had her fake hands on her hips. "Yeah, he plans to change a lot of girls... starting with Sally..."

Cynthia then faced Hypon and makes a pouting face. "I don't understand you both sometimes, logically this 'gender war' is nonsense and I wish one of you would talk some sense into Sonic and Sally. Or at least get the idea of slavery out of your heads." Eric however pointed at the display with a look of annoyance. "Whoa there, it isn't a way we can convince him or her, so cool your chips. Second, you remember how Blaze treated us? I only want fair payback." Cynthia however just crossed her arms and turned her back on Eric, who shook his head before facing Hypon.

"I don't know, Hypon, you seem to grasp this whole 'balance between the sides things', is it possible to change two our most stubborn friends? End an entire war?"
12112.title: Talking with yourself...

121122.content: Hypon said quickly and bluntly, "Yes, but not alone, Cynthia. I've calmed Sally before in some hard situations in the past. However, that was before we were at each other's throats over a technicality. If we tried something now, we would probably either be sent to the firing squad or waiting in a cell in Knothole. The odds would be stacked against us and could discouraged even the bravest of souls..."
121122.title: Not alone, we'd get crushed

1211221.content:
"My calculations predict you are accurate Hypon, but that is no excuse for the filth these boys are doing to their old friends." Cynthia reluctantly answered before facing Eric again, this time with an annoyed look. "Regardless, something needs to be done before someone does something dangerous. My scans of Sonic state he has the capacity for much more than slavery if provoked. As well as Miss Acorn."

"Hang on, I know you can be right Cindy, but Sonic?" Eric asked while glancing around slightly. "We all know him well, he has a good heart. Hell, he saved Mobius from Eggman countless times, him stepping into the shade is difficult to believe. We should know."

"That is incorrect and short sighted Eric, and you know better. All have the capability to do bad if given the correct factors or situation. He can and will do so if not stopped, it's in the math. So will Sally if not guided correctly. If you won't, I will override your access to the main controls and take over your body to force you." Cynthia put her paws on her hips and stared at Eric, who had stopped walking and looked back with outrage.

"You can't do that! I control my own body."

"Test me, and you will find out for yourself Prower." A more robotized voice of Eric's spoke out of his lips, shocking him and Hypon, who saw his friend's eyes glow purple. "I still have to the overrides Eggman put in to put you in your place. Don't think I won't do it, I care too much about our friends." Eric took a different personality for a moment before the glowing stopped and Eric rubbed his head, the hologram of Cynthia disappeared before them.

1311111121111111111212122212111221111111.content:
Hypon and Ice were alone in their room, watching the battle from cameras on the soldiers. Ice was allowed in with Hypon after a lot of hassle from Sonic, involving that she wear metal claw preventers on her hands and feet along with a collar. The collar was not for mind control, Sonic insisted to Hypon when he came to get her collar off, it was only a short range mini burst nerve shocker. Basically, if Ice happened to attack a boy guard, the collar would send pulses to her brain's motor functions to halt her attack, with no brain damage other than a slight headache and the quiet need to find something else to do.

What Sonic didn't tell Hypon was that the collar had to be removed by a tech, it could not be manually altered, and also reacted to increases in mood or emtions that are considered dangerous. Sonic did say that it was the next step with collars when the girls stop trying to kill their masters, since it was less stressful. Ice however didn't appreciate the added features, it still felt like she was on a leash which technically she was.

She knew that they were safe since the area around the base and the village to the north were in a "neutral zone", all the same, she warned them to stay in the bounds of the area and to remain where they were since her power couldn't protect them if they left.

choices: They get a call from Bunny and Amy
13211.content:
Eric put away Amy's ring and started to use his interface on his left eye to scan throughout the data he collected on both the Girls and Boys. The data was originally for Eggman when he was under Eggman's command program, but Eric made sure Eggman couldn't use it. It instead became a weapon to shift the balance between boy or girl rule, and as such, forced Eric to go into hiding with Hypon and Bunny, also bring Amy with him so she could be safe.

It hurt Eric to see this fight happen, even thought his robotic processors told him this would happen. Friends who helped him awake from control and servitude now wanted to dismantle him and use his tech for new weapons. More than once he contemplated ripping out his circuits that kept him alive but Amy was there for him.

Now Eric was forced to sit in a quiet room, safe but the confinement was making him on edge. He didn't like being stuck in one place, not allowed to see sun light. This made Eric all the more anxious to see Amy and be near her.

1321221121111111111111111111111111111211.content:
Eric had made the best efforts into fixing himself up again. This was for the sixth time in a row that his robot side was being altered without his permission and was starting to confuse his fox brain. Eric tested each of his robot brain's lobes, very lucky that he could tell what he was doing and really was glad he learned how to fix himself after being freed from the late Eggman. "Looks fine from here, but why does something feel off?" Eric mused as he worked, sure to be quiet for Amy, who was in the bedroom while he was out on the couch. "Possibly since that Nicole girl had some fun with our system." Cindy, Eric's robotic side of mind answers back with an electronic sigh of annoyance. "She practically ripped up our system protocols with so much hacking and altering. I am surprised you aren't in a scrap heap by now." Eric keeps working despite his robot mind taunting him.

"So when are you going to tell Amy?" Cindy asks, intruding on Eric's work. "Tell her what?" Eric responds, half working and the other half listening. "About me, I mean seriously? You finally got a real girl for your lonely butt, however, you neglected to inform her about the girl in your head? What's that about?" Eric tries not to scoff but does it anyway. "Maybe because I want her to think I'm normal? Maybe because if you did meet her, she would consider me more machine than fox? Just like everyone else has?" Cindy pours and starts to run data from his side to Eric's brain. "Maybe... still a girl needs some girlfriends at some point." Eric muffled his laugh with a hand. "Girl? Your an interface, made to help me deal with this body. You have no gender, except that name you forced me to give you. Besides, you'd bore them to death with your data and I'm not sure you could keep up with current fashion." Cindy gives Eric a jolt. "I could if you gave me a try, but enough, if you keep my brain open too long, I'll get dust and run slower."

When Hypon made it to the head guard office, he noticed the door was open as a sign that Frost was waiting for him. Hypon took a breath and walked in to see Frost sitting on her desk facing the door, which when Hypon came in, she rushed over and hugged him. " I'm glad you came Hypon, there is so much I need to tell you." Frost quietly stated as she held Hypon close, only stopping so she could let them both sit down. "You look good by the way, I see that no one hurt you during your time here." Frost wiped her eyes of tears that were starting to form, trying to control herself so she could get to what she wanted to say.

" Where to begin? I guess I would need to start with a couple of weeks before the start of the war. Sally came to me and stated that she was going to stop Sonic and the other boys while they were still pretending that girls weren't going missing. See she knew what they were doing and she was going to put her foot down. However, she started to lose her trust in all of the boys, including you. She had Wave design a massive pulse weapon that would later be fine tuned into our feminine ray weapons and sex change machines, one hit and you switched chromosomes. She had the chance to take out every boy, but I tried to convince her that not all boys were bad." Frost started to explain and ramble slightly as she looked at Hypon.

"Two days before the war, Sally came back to me again and told me that she was going to go through with her plan regardless of the countless boys who didn't even do anything. However, if I proved my loyalty to her and only her, she would spare to boys the indecency of an unfair fight." Frost looked down and couldn't face Hypon. "That required I cut off all ties to boys, including you, and even the girl versions of the boys. But I did, because I cared about all of the boys and girls, but not even close to how much I love you Hypon. Because I left you, the war kicked up and the boys were able to defend themselves."

Frost was then quiet for a bit and looked back at Hypon. "I guess what I'm trying to tell you, is that if I didn't leave, close to every boy would be a girl. I didn't want to, but the thought of you waking up to a female body with no way to be fixed back was too much to bear."

14212121111122.title: Frost turned her head

choices: Parading around the Ex Queen's Bodyguard...
In the Boiling room, a week later
The guards aere stopped shortly after leaving by a lieutenant
1422.content:
Frost was trying to meditate to keep her mind sharp when she heard her cell door open and close, locking before a few steps went into her cell. "Well, isn't this cozy? You made a little storm in here, how cute Frost." A voice she knew spoke out but the creature that had taken his place was unknown to her as she tried to keep herself from going native on him.

"No comment? Well, I guess we should skip the pleasantries and get to business then." The voice slowly came closer as the steps stopped a few feet from where she was sitting, the blue hedgehog in a winter coat staring at her. Frost held a stare that noticeably unnerved Sonic as they locked eyes, she was holding back rage and displaying disgust at the mockery of his presence. "I want her, now. Tell me where she is, and you will be taken care of. Anything you want, any... girl you want... is yours."

Instead of a response, Sonic saw Frost look up before she spat in his face, looking back down as she continued her meditation. This did not go over well as Sonic growled at her and wiped his face before he kicked her hard in the jaw, seeing her head snap back to catch the blow and pulled back his leg. "You deserved that, and if you keep up this attitude, I'll toss you in the hottest cell we have. You know it is a matter of time before we get her, save countless lives and tell me now, there is no shame in defeat."

Frost however let her jaw go back into position before she spat blood on his shoes, remaining in her seat as her jaw throbbed but didn't want Sonic to have the satisfaction of seeing her hurt. When Sonic saw what she had done to his prized sneakers, he scowled deeply but did not press his luck with her and stepped back. "I guess you think you're tough doing this, we will see how tough you are in the Boiling room. Guards, take her away."

Frost slowly stood up but she was quickly knocked down when they electrocuted her, the collar on her neck sending currents of juice through her spine and body. Slowly the world faded away as she saw boots come and someone picked her up to carry her away, their hands wandering in a way that Frost hated deeply but was almost unable to stop them.
1422.title: A low point...

choices: Later, Frost awakes to someone above her
14222.content:
The Boiling room became a known torture method after the first conflicts and the soultion to silent POW's. By keeping the heat of the room elevated well above what was comfortable, the prisoners would be stuck in a all day sauna that would slowly sap away their energy while they sweated it out. Most prisoners tried to tough it out or assumed it was a joke until all too late when they were too weak to even move. Although normal prisoners can be placed inside, it became popular and effective to place water or ice powerful enemies into the rooms to extract info. Once inside, it is difficult to get out, and every second is one that could permanently end you if you don't hydrate.

Frost sipped her warm water as she sat in her new cell, trying yet again to bend the water in her sweat and cup to move to her will. However, being effective with cold and freezing, her efforts were little to water that was warm, yet it was something to distract her and keep her working. Since she was put into the Boiling Room, she was terribly uncomfortable and found herself restless and unable to sleep for more than a two or more hours at a time. She found herself shaking again and slowly stopped it as as she drank more water, her body suffering at the high heat that consumed her. She was forced to strip down to her underwear in order to prevent from completely overheating in her metal guard outfit, but no matter how hot it went she didn't go farther.

She knew somewhere was a camera or a false wall with boys watching and didn't want her privates on display. Yet they gave her water to keep her moving, as they knew it was necessary for the task, and Frost did her best to try and make the water she had work for her. Luckly she was almost able to move the water a little bit, but she only felt more drained as she felt herself feel weak again. "Damn it, just a little more and I can get out." She muttered to herself before she gave up angrily and finished her water before laying on the warm ground to try and rest. "Maybe next time, and then Sonic is mine..." She almost growled as she passed out on the floor of her cell, unaware of the eyes that were watching her until they left her to her sleep.
14222.title: In the Boiling room, a week later

choices: They go outside, where an army was waiting for them...
142222.content:
The war had been devastating for both the boy side and the girls, each fought with what they could in order to win and neither dared to surrender. The loss of General Frost caused a dip in the girl attacks but slowly they were able to make up their defenses, not everything she taught them was lost.

Frost herself was not in good shape. She had been in the boiling room for a month, longer than any other prisoner and she could not stop the shaking of her body. Frost endured so much, yet the temperature was winning out over her stubborn personality, as well as the lack of food and people to talk to. Solitary confinement in the small room was driving her crazy, her own mind playing tricks on her, seeing people who weren't there and memories playing out on the walls. Frost was practically eager when someone delievered her water, trying to hear them or call out to the one true thing to try and focus away from her stressed out mind.

And she worried, for the fate of her friends, for Sally and her boyfriend. Yet she tried to stay positive, and hoped that Sonic pulled her out of the hell she was forced to live through. She thought about this as she sat in her cell and watched her oldest Samantha love dance in front of her, finding somekind of joy from it, even knowing it was not real. However her show was interrupted by something she did not expect would happen, hearing the sliding of a bolt before the door to her cell opened a crack, bringing in colder air in full.

Alarmed, Frost thought her mind was playing another trick on her so she slowly approached the open door and poked at it, surprised to find that it was real, immediately feeling tears swell in her eyes as she had not realize how happy she was to be free. She then shoved the door open and fell out her cell, the cold air giving her body a chance to finally cool off, easing the shaking of her body before she felt cold metal touch her chin.

"Get up."

Frost opened her eyes to see Sonic above her, holding a ray gun in his hand pointed at her head that was used to stun enemies in combat. The grin on his face made her claws come out but he simply shoved the ray gun more in her face, not willing to take a chance.

"I said, get up!" Sonic shouted at her before he hit her with the side of his gun, making her head flash with white before she dropped flat to the ground. "Move it!"

She slowly got up from the ground, although her knees tried to buckle under her twice, she got almost head level with Sonic before he grabbed her by the back of her neck and shoved her down the hall, his gun pointed at her back. She did not know where she was going but with how Sonic treated her, she did not expect much in the humane department.
142222.title: A month go by...

choices: On the other side of the glass...
The door opens, a familiar face walks in
1422221.content:
They went down a series of hallways, possibly to the otherside of the base, yet Frost had an idea where she was heading. Seeing the boy base reminded Frost of her time exploring her first town after being exiled by force, just as seedy and offensive, slaves walked the hallways and there was always a boy who was rough with them. It made her sick, yet Sonic the Hedgehog seemed like it was normal to parade around half-naked women on their knees doing forced acts, making her think it was all for his and his boy's egos. The collars around the slaves necks changing who the women were, into whatever the base wanted.

And there laid Frost's expectations as they stopped in front of a pair of doors, marked "Interrogation". Sonic jab her back with the tip of his ray gun as he moved her to one door and lead her through it, revealing a table with a bar through a side. She tried to move to the chair but was whacked again by Sonic until he picked her up by her arm and dropped her into the chair himself, cuffing her arms to the bar and then her feet to chains on the floor. "I was going to sit down, do you get off hitting defenseless women now Sonic?" Frost commented as she felt her cheek bruise from the second hit

"We are not taking chances with you." He responded as he made sure she was locked in tight, slowly moving to the other side of the table. Sonic then pulled a few things out from a cabinet across from the door, placing a knife, a tazer, a file with her name on it, and a police baton on the table that was out of her reach. "You will talk, don't get comfortable."

"I was going to say the same for you Hedgehog." Frost answered back, frowning as Sonic left the room with a slam, testing her restraints to find she was stuck. The room was simular to the one on the old base, dark with a single light in the center and a one way mirror on the opposite side, and uncomfortable chairs. They even turned up the temperature but she barely noticed it as her eyes were focused on the mirror. They were sending someone to break her, since Sonic didn't have the balls, and she was prepared to again state nothing. However her time in the boiling cell had left her drained and she was still seeing hallucinations in the dark of enemies and friends alike, so she hoped she still had it in her as the boys choose who would come in and try.
1422221.title: They enter an interrogation room

choices: With Hypon, now with a pair of eyes watching him
Frost's remembrance of the old days
14222212.content:
Frost heard the deadbolt open before the door swung ajar, turning to face her interrogator with a skeptical look, but was shocked to see the purple leopard of her past come through the door and lock it behind her. "You...? " The leopard seemed to grin at her shock and moved over to the startled ice wolf, sitting in the oppposite chair with her leather boots resting on the table, leaning back as they matched looks.

"Surprised? I guess after ratting me out to the squirrel and having me stripped of rank, you'd thought I wouldn't come back. I guess I'm not done haunting you yet." The leopard reaching into her pocket and took a swig of a flask she had, extending it to Frost before taking it back before her ex could reach it. "Now isn't this a familiar scene? You coming to me to make the world a little bit more bearable for the toy sword sweetheart..."

"Ashley, you-"

Ashley however stood up and grabbed the taser, zapping it in the air a few times near Frost's face, her own grim and hateful. "Not today native, 'cause now you have little old me to deal with. You can't talk you way out of this one, your sweet talk has run out with me the second I was locked up in a small metal box for a long time. And now... the roles are reversed... how typical of us."

Frost tried to face Ashley, feeling old anger bubble up as she responded with an anger she reserved for Sonic. "I was correcting you. You were a drug kingpin working as a slaver the moment I met you, using your power to bust your rivials and sell their product! That was your choice, and it came to bite you, if it wasn't me it would've been another of the guard."

"Bullshit! You were my girlfriend, you were supposed to back me up or leave if your panties were that twisted over it. But the last thing you were supposed to do was stab me in the back by going to the princess, then having me throw in prison. If I remember right, you enjoyed my stash the same as any of my customers, so fuck off with the white knight routine. We both know you have some grey in there..." Ashley snapped, slamming her hands on the table just as the room went icy cold.

The ice wolf in chains stared back and stood up, her powers flowing from her in small bursts as Frost managed to control what she had in her tank. "I got addicted because you took advantage of a girl with no street-smarts. I didn't want to take that junk, but you keep pressuring me until I ended up so messed up that I nearly lost everything! How was I supposed to leave when my girlfriend was fucking up everything my best friend was working towards?! You talk about betrayal, but the biggest betrayal is you abusing my trust and loyalty to claim a position you didn't earn and poisoning what relationship we had with your drugs and greed."

As Frost finished, she felt her legs give out and fell back into her seat, her body still weakened from her time in the Boiling room, her eyes losing focus on the smirk of the purple leopard who was her girlfriend. "I'd say we could argue this all day, but you look like you'll pass out in an hour. Now that our trip down memory lane has concluded..." Ashley grabbed the knife and walked over to Frost's side of the table and picked her nails with the tip of the blade, her eyes cool but her smile dark and foreboding. "Where is that uptight bitch Sally and her little friends...?"

"Eat a dick and choke, I'm not saying."

The purple leopard laughed instead of being offended, making Frost confused as the knife was slammed into the table. "I thought that was your thing now? Some boy from that tribal forest you call home, Hyper... Hype... oh yes, Hyperion. I heard he was in the building since you've been here, and he hasn't even tried to save you? Tsk tsk tsk." Ashley laughed again as Frost lowered her head in silence, raising it only when the cold baton under her chin and forcing the ice wolf to lock eyes with her ex. "I guess he doesn't care about you after all, letting Sonic do what he wants with you. It's sad really, but it seems like only your info will give you a chance. Hmm, maybe I'll see if he really is as loyal as you believe he is, if he even remembers you when he works me over."

Ashley barely finished her sentence when she was headbutted hard by Frost, giving her a fat lip and the start of a bruise. She laughed dryly before she hit Frost with the baton hard in the head, wiping the blood from her lip. "Looks like I hit a nerve. Good. Time to go back home girl, I'll be back once I got your man running circles around me." Frost barely looked up before another hit knocked her lights out, leaving her limp as she was dragged back to the Boiling Room and locked up once again.
14222212.title: Ex #1 Ashley returns!

choices: During his rounds, he gets approached by Ashley
During his rounds, a fight between two girls broke out
142222122.content:
As Frost was knocked out, Hypon's eyes opened up as an interruption to his meditation as if he could sense what was happening from the other side of the base. He was in his office that he was assigned to as one of the Wardens of the Prison Sector, but he had a few restrictions placed on him because of Sonic's belief that Hypon was trading secrets to the other side which was false. Hypon wasn't that stupid when it came to a position of power, however; He was to blame for Frost's capture as he thought that he wasn't followed to their meeting place that was his old village's ruins to finally see her in person rather than dreams hence why he was not able to face her without feeling any guilt for what had happened but tried to make sure that she wasn't treated like most of the prisoners that weren't in his sector but to no avail because of Sonic's tampering. Over the month, Sonic and Hypon were at each other's throats over the situation and almost led to several fights between them. Sonic may have more authority than Hypon, but he didn't have the respect of most of the men. Everyone could tell that Sonic was slowly losing it, but no one wanted to say anything about it due to what he could do to them. Hence why Hypon was not executed and placed under heavy watch along with a minor restricted access that didn't apply to his current position because if he was to be killed; Sonic would have to face not only the wrath of half the base and Sally but Frost's anger as well.

Hypon was well-liked by his prisoners and by most of the base who didn't blindly follow Sonic's orders without question. His sector mainly consisted of the previous male populous who were taken and transformed into women and captured in previous battles along with a few normal girls who none of the wardens could control. He treated each member of his sector as equals to himself, not using force unless absolutely needed. He didn't have many guards under him, but he could do without the drama of the guards who were too frisky with the inmates and other antics that occurred in the other sectors. However, Hypon was very troubled after being awakened from his meditation, expecting that Frost was being interrogated currently; which did not please him as he despised using violence on prisoners as it never helped anyone. He just sighed before getting off the ground and pulling up his cameras to keep an eye on his prisoners as he got dressed for his rounds, his mind wandering as he hoped that he would be asked to help with anyone's "tensions" as he wasn't in the greatest of moods to help anyone in that way after the month he had fought against Sonic and his lackeys who tried to hurt him but failed miserably. It didn't take long for him to get his jacket and armor on and readied himself for anything and everything.
142222122.title: The Fair Judge and Watched Warden

choices: Hypon questions Ashely's presence in his section
Hypon greets the newer recruit normally, but watches her
Hypon dismissed Ashley as he had to focus on his work
1422221221.content:
As Hypon worked from cellblock to cellblock, checking off requests and confirming the standard of living of prisoners that were held in his section of the prison, he began to notice a purple leopard in the distance of the cellblock moving towards his place. His first thought was that one of his own prisoners had gotten free and was looking to shack up, as a female that wasn't under control were practically finite, yet she wore the uniform jacket of a lieutenant in Sonics army with a badge marked as "hands off". She didn't care for the troop standards as she wore black leather boots that went just below the knee and her long hair was below her shoulders, a t-shirt under her jacket that held a reference to a show well before the war. She was armed with a stun gun and a knife that was on her otherside of the belt, which wiggled as her walk seemed to show off her hips. She was pretty attractive with a shapely body that grabbed eyes as she walked along the cages, which made him wonder how someone like her wasn't under guard or how she managed to become enlisted in the Boy Army of all places.

Hypon remembered that someone had told him something about a leopard in the past but he didn't managed to recall it as the girl approached him and stood right in his path. "Hello Hyperion. I've been looking to meet with you for some time now. My name is Ashley, I was recruited by Sonic not too long since he captured this base and found me here." The purple leopard managed to smile, but her eyes were full of a hunger that Hypon couldn't tell was for him or for something he would lead her to. He could also smell some drugs in her pack now that she was closer to him that seemed to rest behind her belt and that she had lit a joint not that long ago, but her fat lip and a bruise on her chin concerned him as the seemed fresh.
1422221221.title: During his rounds, he gets approached by Ashley

14222212212.content:
Hypon felt something was off about this particular recruit as there were several leading questions that he wanted to ask, but decided not to act on them as he wanted to give the woman in front of him some amount of privacy.

He then gently smiled before speaking, being as formal as he could as he was a low grade commander, "Afternoon, lieutenant. And you don't need use my full version of my name; I mainly go by Hypon." He then took a look at the lip and bruise and asked, "I take it that you are looking for either the infirmary or someone who can help you with the person who clocked you?"

He rarely got visitors..well, at least friendly visitors that didn't appear like they wanted something. That being said, he had a bad vibe about this leopard, mainly due to the drugs he could smell but what was really setting him off was how she was looking at him like he was some sort of prime rib but he was able to keep this thoughts covered as he added, "Well, let me finish up my rounds first and then I can give you my full attention. You can join if you want, but be warned; you might attract some very unwanted attention that you may or may not want."

And with that, Hypon made his way down the corridor, catching a few eyes that were focused on him and the leopard, rolling his eyes as he continued his walk and making sure on each inmates' needs and requests, writing it down, and going down the line. He always put work before kind conversation, but not wanting to be rude; he handled it as kindly and gentlemanly as he could before making his exit.
14222212212.title: Hypon greets the newer recruit normally, but wa...

choices: Hypon helps Ashley, wanting to try and ease Frost's solitude and pain
Hypon turns Ashley away, believing Frost would refuse info regardless
Hypon questions Ashley's involvement with Sonic
142222122121.content:
Ashley seemed to chuckle as she followed after Hypon, as they moved however she reached into her pocket and lit another small joint habitually, exhaling away from Hypon. "Don't worry about my marks or me, it's actually one of the reasons I'm here. Unfortunately, my matters are on a deadline and I think you should know why I'm really here for you before someone suspects what I came here for." Hypon still worked as the leopard fumbled around her pocket and pulled out her ID to him, showing her status as an "Prisoner Negotiator". The title usually spent most of their time trying to make life comfortable for detainees in exchange for smaller pieces of info like previous coordinates they knew or scouting positions. When Hypon passed it back after a good look at it, Ashley continued to talk as they walked down the cells.

"Right now I'm working on your ex-girlfriend's case under the watch of Sonic and Tara hasn't exactly been helping my cause. She's fighting against everyone and Sonic has made it clear if I don't get her to speak on some info by the end of the week he is likely to throw me to the wolves in the base." When Hypon glanced up, he saw genuine fear in her body language, but she seemed to put up a good front as she inhaled more of her joint and exhaled. "She's fighting hard against any type of conversation, she didn't believe me when I told her I was working to help her. Some brute of a boy is interrogating her on Sonic"s orders and he hasn't been easy on her or me. Bastard clocked me in the face when I told him to get his hands off of her, and he barely got in trouble for it."

Ashley stamped out her joint at the end of the line of cells and faced Hypon with a sympathetic look. "I'm taking a big risk talking to you about her case, the hedgehog has made it clear that he wants you in the dark, but I think you can get her to call off this suicidal path through me. Just tell me something just she and you know, so that she can believe I'm talking to you and maybe she can get out of the Boiling room if she tells something small. She's been in there for a while, and I'm not sure she can handle much more before she breaks down. Please Hypon?" Even though Hypon felt that she has a bad vibe and clearly was in deep with many of the things he fought against in the past, her story seemed to phase him as he hadn't actually heard about anyone particularly interrogating Frost or that they had her locked in the Boiling room for a while. The idea that Frost was suffering cut at Hypon's heart and here was a leopard who claims to want to help them both.
142222122121.title: She follows after him

choices: Ashley answered him as best she could
Ashley continued to plead for his help
1422221221213.content:
Hypon took all of this in as he made it to the end of the cell block and began to make his way back to his office, remaining silent for a moment as he finally spoke, "Before I agree or disbelieve anything that you have said, lieutenant; I have to ask what's your involvement in this? It takes alot of nerve to skirt around Sonic's back to talk to the one person who is on his shit list and go to the person who is close to the one that is being tortured."

He wanted to see how much of what she was telling him was truth and what was bullshit. He heard rumors about a brute was hurting women prisoners on base and the fact that they were attacking their own people as well as prisoners angered him to a degree. However, he cared for Frost and did not want to see her suffer and rather her be under his care and watch even if he had to force Sonic into letting him have her but he didn't know who this negotiator was, making him take very careful steps on what he said and did around her.

Hypon then added, "Pardon my curiosity but I haven't seen you around the base nor see your name come across my desk on intakes, negotiators, and fellow soliders so you must expect me to ask these questions or at least be wary of having someone you haven't seen before ask me for help on a case that I'm tied heavily in the middle of."
1422221221213.title: Hypon questions Ashley's involvement with S...

choices: Hypon was willing to get Ashley some trust
Hypon still wasn't sure and had more questions
14222212212131.content:
Ashley followed Hypon as he moved towards his office, her hands fidgety and fighting the urge to light up again as she always did so when business was in front of her, instead brushing supposed dust off her pants and putting her hands in her jacket pockets. "I wouldn't exactly say it was my choice to see Frost as a client, Sonic made that decision for me or I would be wearing a collars like those... poor girls. If I'm going to do this job, I might as well do it right, no offense though, but I would've left this whole stretch of land and it's war for a beach somewhere else." Hypon saw the leopard finally just sigh and grab something else from her pouch, allowing him to see several types of drugs in there and wonder if the girl was addicted to them all or selling.

"And about not seeing my face or name around..." Ashely said before she lit a slim cigarette, exhaling with a finally relaxed look, annoyed how hard it was to get her tolerance back up after being locked up for so long without anything. "I was locked in a cell not unlike Tara for a long time, and spent most of the time being interrogated by Sonic to see if I knew anything or was going to be a problem after I was found. I hope you understand it's not exactly something I want to talk about unless we have something strong to drink, as you and Sonic supposedly have very different ideas about proper treatment with prisoners while they are unable to fight back."

The leopard saw Hypon's looks and zipped up her bag, her own starting to get hard to his judgemental face. "You would too with what I had to endure, so take that look somewhere else."
14222212212131.title: Ashley answered him as best she could

142222122121312.content:
Hypon took all of this in as he made it to his office, sitting in his chair as Ashley sat across him, remaining silent for a moment as he put together everything that was said. This negotiator seemed to be telling most of the truth to his questions and it looked like she didn't exactly have many options to help Frost or herself regardless if he allowed her or not, so he thought it wouldn't hurt to humor her to a point. "Suppose I give you something, something only she and I know, what exactly is your play? Frost does not surrender on her loyalties for anyone, even for me, how exactly do you expect her to give up info on Sally's locations?"

"We will work our way up to Sally." Ashley answered as she smoked more, pulling out a notepad and pen, glancing around at his office lazily. "I know Frost won't betray Sally outright, but a spot there and a place watched may get Sonic off her back and out of that hole that is slowly adding up on her mind. Your info could allow her to know that you are in the loop and that she is on your mind, because as of now she seems to think you have abandoned her. It could be transformative in terms of her morale to know that a plan is happening than the long silence." She put out her smoke on the bottom of her boot and tossed it into the trash, keeping careful eye on Hypon and her surroundings. "Just a phrase or a couple of words that she knows only you would say to her, someone she cared about who is gone or a memory you share."

Hypon, report to cell 43. Prisoner is having migraines and needs additional meds. Hypon, report to cell 43.

Both Hypon and Ashley hear the intercom go off from the speaker in Hypon's office, when he glanced at Ashley, she waved him away crossing her legs and leaning back. "Go ahead, I'll wait for you."

He rarely kept anything relating to Frost out in the open of his office so he was expecting her to wait for his return as he walked outside with the medical bag before sprinting down the hallway to head to Cell 43, not wanting his prisoner to suffer from her medical condition. Even when it came to a decision of freeing his beloved from her hellish nightmare; he had to focus on the certainties rather than the uncertainties especially with the position he was currently in. As Hypon left and hurried down the cellblock to meet his prisoner to see what her situation was, he was greeted by a few spare guards who were bounded by duty to help despite personal preference of boss, who were leaned over a prisoner who's hands were bounded tightly. "Her head is hot, we gave her water but it didn't seem to help. She is complaining of the lights and she won't stop covering her ears so we think it's a migraine." One of the guards commented as Hypon knelt by her side and looked her over, his eyes filled with distrust in him; but honest concern for the prisoner. "It might be the food, we're using some older stuff since the shortage for the girls." Another commented as he was checked her neck for a pulse, with no change as far as he saw.

The Nightwolf took his time to check everything and quickly started to give the correct medicines to help lessen her symptoms, removing her bounds once she was properly locked up again and addressed his guards. "We requested fresher food already, remind them that if they hold back on proper foods, these women have less to lose if they want to break out. They are our people, even changed, they deserve to have proper meals. Keep an eye on her if she gets worse, I need to get back to my office, but call me again if she acts out again." He then jogged towards his office as he had a feeling Ashley would be getting restless or she would be called to some task soon, but mostly he wondered if she had messed with his office. When he arrived at his office door, he opened it to find Ashley sitting in his desk with her feet up while she read from a folder that looked like a prisoner file.

"Everything fine?" She asked as she lifted her eyes from it, not apologetic for taking his spot, but the photo clipped on the folder caught his eye. It was his girlfriend Frost, from the time well before the war for her Freedom Fighter profile, dressed in her guard uniform from way back when with an Acorn insignia on the shoulders. There was also a red stamp on the outside marked "VIP: Capture or Kill", but Hypon guessed the file was before they took Frost captive as it was not one of his. "Just some light reading while I waited in a comfy chair..." Ashley told Hypon as he closed the door behind him, closing it to address him fully.

14222212212131232.content:
The purple leopard allowed Hypon a decent headstart before she got up and sat at his desk, testing each drawer and looking inside for a little trinket to show Frost to get her talking again. After she found nothing but paper, she got up and went to the bookcase in the corner, skimming the book titles until she had found a prize. Ashley figured a memory between the two was as good as anything to trick Frost and pulled a photo album that seemed to date before the war, slipping through pages quietly while glancing up to see if Hypon was coming back. She only wanted to get inside her ex's head and get her to cough up the details, wrapping up the leopard's business with Sonic and allowing her to roam beyond the base without fear of becoming a slave. The idea of guys going at her without her having any control made her sick and scared, as she never cared for any guy the same way she cared for the women she had been with. She did wonder what made Frost make the leap, as she couldn't get her to give the goods high or sober.

She finally snagged a decent choice page where she saw pictures of them outside of some mountain village, one where they were at a beach and another outside of the base they are in now. Ashley however noticed a difference in Frost when she looked at the beach picture and found some kind of tattoo on her behind that seemed new, but the image seemed to have an H of some kind. "You never was one for ink Tara, I even asked you..." She muttered to herself as she felt a small ping of jealousy bubble up, only to be shoved down by her anger, not letting her emotions cloud her mind as she closed the book and put it back. Ashley did know from Frost's stories of her tribal the importance of tattoos and figured she likely got it once they decided to go steady. It was a start, and all she needed was a way to get Frost to believe that Hypon wasn't coming to save her and the job would be done. "If only it could really be that simple..." Ashley muttered as she popped back some pills, now needing to dull her aching heart as well as her head.

1422221221213123232.content:
"What exactly do you have for me Ashley?" The blue hedgehog asked as he was signing off reports from battles and requisition for gear, glaring at the purple leopard who was refused to face him. He was starting to lose patience with her plans and was considering slapping on a collar to make her available for morale boosting his soldiers. "You have had a couple of days and I expect to see some movement on breaking that Ice Wolf bitch."

Ashley did her best to hide the recoil from Sonic's tone that made her want to knock his block off, but continued to cross her arms and lean against the wall near his desk with a cigarette in the corner of her mouth. "You honestly think she will break that easy? My method will work, just keep calm and allow me to shatter that act of hers. I've learned that her bond with Hypon is stronger than I first thought, but I managed to do some research and found some chinks in that armour of hers that I will rip to pieces."

Sonic however didn't look impressed as he put his pencil down, resting his hands down as he stared her down. "I am fighting a war here, every second we waste is one Sally can use to bring me down, I don't have time for you to chat up your ex! I even managed to get your old gear and your extensive list of narcotics to help get you into the mood faster, but now I'm honestly wondering if I made a mistake allowing you to wander freely here."

"I am doing what you instructed me to do, but your petulance doesn't help anyone!" Ashley stared him down, having faced worse threats than the boy in a chair twice his size. "You knew that I could get into Frost's mind and you gave me this chance to get the job done, so let me work in peace. I finish my jobs so don't turn a friend into an enemy..."

The hedgehog gritted his teeth as he was picturing ways to break the leopard into nothing but a sex slave, but managed a smile that held too much sweetness to be honest. "Of course. Just remember our agreement, Frost for your own freedom, and if you fail you will join the others." Sonic then pressed a button on his desk and Mina Mongoose came into the room with a collar and went behind the desk, resulting in a horrified look on Ashley when she began to pleasure him, only for him to wave her away. "Don't come back until you have her barking on command. Dismissed."

The purple leopard moved at a fast pace from the office, growling as she hated this set up he had her in, thinking of ways to get back at him as she popped back more pills until she felt her body finally get numb again. "Alright Tara, this will hurt you just much as I know it will. If not, then maybe I have to go off script..."
1422221221213123232.title: Exchanging one prison for another

14222212212131232323.content:
Hypon reviewed the tape when he got back to his office, seeing that Ashley had touched one of his scrapbooks that meant a lot to him and was very furious at the fact that Sonic had someone in to get information about Frost, thinking that he might have something of use on her. He wasn't just going to stand aside for that...not anymore. After Hypon locked up his office, he made his way directly over towards Sonic's office. He was prepared to bring hell with him.

On the way over towards Sonic's office, Hypon made his way before being stopped by a collection of soldiers before kindly asking what the meaning of this was. One of the soldiers, a tabby cat named Gerald looked at Hypon and spoke, "If you think we are going to let you pass through his hallway, sympathizer. You have another thing coming." Hypon just looked at Gerald and then the other soldiers before simply saying, "We might be at war but not every person has to follow Sonic's thought process and honestly; I don't care what a few grunts think about my methods. Now, I will ask again to kindly move out of my way." Gerald laughed at Hypon's face before shoving him back. Hypon just sighed before punching Gerald in the gut, watching the cat drop to his knees before having Hypon's own knee connect with the tabby's nose before speaking to the hurt grunt, "I asked nicely" before looking at the others, adding, "Now, do I need to send more people into the medical bay or can I pass through now." The other guards moved out of Hypon's way, leaving their "friend" laying in the floor as the wolf made his march without hesitation or fear. Hypon meant business and was ready to go above Sonic if he had to if the hedgehog would not budge.

142222122121312323232.content:
As Hypon made it to Sonic's office, he pushed past one guard who moved to block him before flinging the door open, to see Sonic at his desk and a collared Mina Mongoose beside him while wiping her mouth. "Sure Hypon, just come right into my office, it's not like I might be busy with a lady." The sarcasm in Sonic's voice was obvious as he turned to the collared Mina and waved her away. "Don't think we are done yet, go wait in my room while I deal with this." The yellow mongoose with purple hair glanced between Hypon's rage, Sonic and the guard pointing a gun at Hypon before moving away with her eyes low, getting far enough away while Sonic zipped his pants up. "I assume you heard the news?"

"If you mean about Frost being captured and your lieutenant digging for dirt on her, yes I heard." Hypon spoke firmly as he didn't appreciate the gun at his head, but knew that anything would have him shot, so he waited for his moment. "I saw her going through my scrapbooks and I know that you have been hiding Frost's capture from me for a month or more while you interrogated her. I swear Sonic, if you hurt her in any way..."

Sonic however just stood up and walked to his window, resting his hands on the sill while he looked outside at the courtyard exercises, not particularly intimidated with his threat. "You were not in the need-to-know. The bias you have for her safety would put the interrogation at risk of failure, which puts everyone on this base at risk. Do you see everyone out there? We are in a war, something that doesn't look favorably to time wasted. Right now, Sally's forces are fighting our boys and she is causing many boys to become girls or become wounded beyond any battle." Sonic turned to face Hypon, his look sour at Hypon as he crossed his arms and leaned back on the sill. "Frost has the power to end this, yet her stubbornness to talk has made us have to be more... practical."

"This war is between you and Sally over your ideals, everyone else is forced to be a part of the ride." The Nightblood spoke clearly, but quickly followed up after Sonic started to chuckle. "My 'bias' towards Frost is because I know what you would be willing to do to her to get what you wanted, which is everything. You and your methods on getting women to talk are inhumane, and if what boy you have going at Frost so much as tries, I will castrate him if she won't." Hypon felt the gun barrel nudge his head but Sonic shook his head, so the guard stepped back again. "I want Frost in my care and outside of that Boiling room, right now, or I will go to the council to do it."

The blue hedgehog however continued to laugh, pressing a button on his desk that brought more soldier to aid him. "The council already knows about Frost, the majority signed off with getting her to talk by whatever means, apparently they can see the need to get Sally's bodyguard and top general to sing. And about the methods to get the Ice wolf to sing, she might actually prefer the person working on her than some of my others." Hypon could hear some chuckles from behind him as the guards aimed at him, but Sonic just sat back at his desk and watched him. "I did agree with the council that after we had gotten every single bit of info out of that girl, she will be returned to you. Although, she will wear a collar like the others and will obey commands from you, me and a third party that you don't need to know about yet. Can't have her going back and causing trouble... although she does stir up a certain response from the recruits being half naked all the time..."

He had proof of Sonic's misconduct but had to persuade the council to give him control which was harder said than done as two members of Sonic's family were on the council. Hypon had his work cut out for him but he was going to get something done about Frost even if that meant using force..

14222212212131232323221.content:
The Ice Wolf sat on her bed in the corner of her cell, taking deep breathes as she embraced the cold of her room and trying to get herself ready for her plan in motion. A member of what she assumed was the council was doing checks as "requested" by a "warden of female POW's" and found her nearly dying in the Boiling Room, which led to her being reassigned to her previous cell that was still half frozen by her earlier efforts. Frost did ask to see the warden, wanting to thank what little humanity she got, but the council member explained that it wasn't possible until she cooperated with Sonic's questions about Sally and her info. It still helped in a big way once she crunched down the ice and managed to rehydrate and calm her worn-out body.

Frost did still have to deal with the remaining problem between Sonic trying to break her again, along with the threat of sex by any number of boys in the base, and the almost certainty that she was not going to get her clothes back from the Boiling Room. Yet she had much more mobility in an environment she could control, along with a body that was stronger and the return of most of her mind from unraveling into mush. To deal with the second issue, she put a heavy freeze on any camera and two-way mirror in the room that may give the boys ideas about her body, the third wasn't much of a problem as she was comfortable in the cold to the point she could easily sleep naked in the snow, as long as no one would be able to stare if they couldn't get in easy. The issue with Sonic was much harder than a simple fix, requiring outside help or submitting to Sonic and likely being collared like a pet, both extremely unlikely to happen. She could escape, as long as she planned it right, but the risk that would fall to her boyfriend would be heavy and she could bet Sonic would use him to get to her just like before she was caught.

The idea on how to get word to Hypon would require more... finesse, as most boys wanted to bed her than pass word to her true partner, along with Sonic who would be keeping an eye on any communications she had and also wanted to break her in a bed. Yet her past had taught her the value of a motivated asset, one that was on their way by Sonic who thought he was getting to her. Frost turned to the door of her cell and saw Sonic along with the yellow mongoose she requested, thankfully dressed in clothes that would keep her warm in the environment, yet wore the collar of a slave. "So you finally gave in about my offer?" Sonic spoke through his own winter clothes as he shoved Mina into the room, holding a ray rifle in his hands just in case. "Figures after you saw your home for pissing me off. Now... after your night of fun, you better start talking about that squirrel."

"You will get everything you deserve Sonic, I will make sure of that..." The Ice Wolf responded as she helped Mina up and moved her to the bed, careful to watch him leave and paused until she knew he had left. She made sure to thicken the ice as much as possible to prevent the collar's signal from being caught outside the room and quickly smacked away Mina's hands when she started to strip down. "I don't want that and don't worry, he can't hear or see us right now beyond the storm." The yellow mongoose looked confused as the 'training' they had done on her through the collar had a toll on her, making her try again until the Ice Wolf held her hands in her own. "Mina... I cannot even imagine what you have been through, but you can help end this hell if you do me one simple request. I need you to find Hypon and deliver a message to him only, and if anyone asks, I am asking you to tell Hypon dumping him in exchange for you to be my girlfriend, make up a reason why. Can you do this for me Mina?"

At first, the mongoose seemed to drift away in her mind and Frost was worried that tbe former star was too far gone to help, yet a tight squeeze in her hands and a firm but quiet shaking voice put her mind to ease. "Anything to end that... bastard.. Sonic, now... I assume you want me to... make noises while you explain this to me? So those... monsters can get off...?"

Meanwhile, around Midnight...

Hypon was walking in the garden, taking a night stroll under the cover of meeting with some of the council members that he was friends with before the war or had established a relationship with during the war. This first member to visit Hypon in the garden was Locke. Locke, a former general and leader of the Knuckles Clan in his time, knew that Hypon's moral code was something to be marveled at as it had a plan for almost any situation and could just see how Hypon's anger towards Sonic's choices as a leader hooked him to the very core. Locke was against the enslavement idea and releasing Frost under his custody but couldn't be sold on the impeaching Sonic as he saw it as a lost cause while Uncle Chuck and Jules were on Sonic's side. Unless Hypon could get enough of the council on his side, he would not have his vote for removing Sonic.

After Locke left, Hypon moved to the next spot on his walk, a different part of the large garden where Moss the Sloth, an old hermit who had seen plenty in his lifetime. Moss was a very neutral council member, very known not to pick sides unless it was something he was avidly against. Sonic and Moss did have a relationship when Dark Gaia was a threat but Hypon's relationship with Moss became close before the war began. It almost became like Lupe's relationship with Hypon when he was starting out as a recruit. Moss was going to need time to think about choosing Hypon over Sonic as a leader but thought that Frost should be under his care after seeing a recent report of the prisons that were being used for POWs.

After Moss left the meditation spot in the garden, there was a nearby rustle that occurred as Hypon remained seated in meditation before the wolf opened his eyes and spoke to the air, knowing that someone was there. "Glad to see the old king still has some tricks, I see." Hypon stood up and saw the final member he was meeting with this night; Nigel Acorn, Sally's father. Nigel and Hypon's relationship was very brief but had one goal; end the war with little causalities. They both saw Sonic as the issue and the one who was causing the war to turn the way it had become. Sally had only stooped to Sonic's level after he did something to cause her hand. Nigel knew that Sally would never do anything drastic unless pushed towards doing it, even if it went against everything she knew and cared for.

Hypon's plan was to simply show that Sonic was no longer fit to be the leader of the army but he had his work cut out for him with most of the other council members as they either didn't like the fact that he was a warden who protected his prisoners and would discipline male guards who stepped out of line and were caught abusing prisoners in one way shape or form or they didn't like him for the fact that he saw and fought for certain female POWs who were considered "high-value targets" be moved into his block for protection (both for the men's and the POWs). Most of the high-value targets were females every single male on base wanted to break in or humiliate for Sonic's cause against Sally which was a way of boosting "morale" that Hypon saw as barbaric.

Around 5 am...

Hypon was stirred from his sleep to a knock on his door, still tired from his talks eariler and trouble sleeping knowing Sonic was going to interrogate Frost today. He managed to slip on a pair of pants before he went to the door, glancing through the peephole to see the yellow mongoose Mina, who looked particularly on edge. "Mina? Is everything-?" The Nightblood asked as he opened his door, before he felt her fingers rest on his lips and watched her close the door behind them, at first wondering if she was hiding from Sonic. Mina turned to him and gestured a pen writing in the air, only stopping once she had a pad and paper to quickly write, making him think she was trying to send him a message without letting Sonic or his goons know. Once she was done, the mongoose turned to him and spoke in a low tone before leaving the room. "Good luck..."

The message she left behind sat on the table, where Hypon sat down to figure out what was happening, reading the note that would connect all the dots. The message started with the warning about Ashley, marking her as the interrogator and her ex girlfriend for him, and also stating the fake 'deal' she made with Sonic to get Mina to him,which may escalate tension when she will not give in for her interrogation today. The middle was a broad sense of where she was on the base from the interrogation room to her cell which helped narrow her placement while also stating she would also lower the temperature in the base where she was as another way to track her. The last bit of it was rambling worry that Frost wouldn't get to see him again and how much she cared about him, warning him that Ashley would not go down without a bloody fight and her desire to hug him tightly once the whole mess was over.

From Frost's note, Hypon had two solid options to play and relatively decent time to put things into place. He could go searching for her as he knew Sonic would likely have her up at dawn to have Ashley work on her, following the leopard or hunting the spot down by her clues. He could also get the council to see what Sonic's methods really came down to by bringing them to witness the event, giving him leverage over those who favored Sonic by showing the beast lurking, at the cost of Frost for a few moments. Both had risks from how the Council would see him if he broke a prisoner free to what could happen to his love while he waited for people to find their hearts, yet he knew time was not a factor in his favor as he could only do one option effectively. So he...

151.content:
Knuckles the Echidna, one of the boy's strongest soldiers, a lot could be said about what he did battle for the boys. However, this story isn't about his past, but the future.

18 Months into the war...

1 Lt. Knuckles the Echidna was captured while being on the front lines of the 6th battle, which took place in Central City, and was later changed into First Private Natalie the Echidna for the Female Fighters, lead by Empress Sally Acorn, the ex-leader of the Freedom Fighters Task Force, which were lead by both Male and Female. Natalie wasn't brainwashed fully, but she knew that she was once a boy, and would later forget that fact. and slowly believe she had her eyes opened to the truth.

24 months into the war...

Six months later after the change of Knuckles the Echidna, a quick rumor flooded the Girls' Bases across Mobius, that Captain Hypon aka Gris Bradley had left the Boy's Army and heard he had a large bounty on his head. But the rumor was dismissed after a stakeout mission showed that Hypon was still very affiliated with the Boy Army and was standing next to Shadow as several girls were changed and showed no remorse to the very fact that his own friends and fellow mobians were being changed, possibly forever.

30 months into the war...

At the battle inside the Feral Forest, Corporal Natalie the Echidna and Sergeant Major Blaze the Cat were captured by the male forces and had to stop Blaze from using her pyrotechnic powers, so they cuffed her with a special kind of handcuffs that would stop any person's powers or abilities function normally. As both of them walked into the main base inside the Feral Forest, Blaze saw Hypon watching from the balcony; however, when Natalie glanced in the same direction, she saw nothing.

3 days after the Battle in the Feral Forest

Natalie and Blaze were forcibly brought into a interrogation room and told to sit and not move, or else deal with punishment. They didn't move an inch and waited for the boy who would be talking to them. They waited five minutes and stared at the door, but nothing happened. Then another five passed and finally the door opened, revealing a familiar face and voice: "Good evening, ladies. Welcome home."
151.title: There and Back Again...
