Shadow just frowned and answered back with an annoyed look. "If you're asking me if I would rape Rouge, no, I would not Knuckles. However Sonic's rule is law, period, despite what we may think. Plus Rouge could've ran before helping the girls. Sonic needed this in order to keep opinions of him high, I don't like it, but this is how it is."

Knuckles growled and faced Eric and Hypon, who remained quiet throughout the meeting. "She is going to be abused by every guy on this base after her mind wipe, this is wrong, or are you both getting off on this?"

"Shadow is right Knuckles, Sonic's rule is law. We do anything, we will be hunted down, so be careful what you say Knuckles." Eric sighed and pushed past Knuckles who had gotten too close to his face. "I'm going to say my peace to Rouge, and swear to her that I won't touch her after it happens. You all should do the same, her time is close at hand." Eric then walked away from the trio to follow after the crowd of boys to see Rouge.

"Cold hearted bastard!" Knuckles yelled after Eric but he just growled and sat down while Shadow and Hypon look at each other.
1541.title: Rouge will be a sex slave for all

1542.content: Many boys were upset that they would not get to enjoy Rouge as a slave, but Sonic's decision was final and no one opposed his orders. So Rouge would be questioned only, and only Hypon and Eric as lieutenants would lead the interrogation. "So do you want to be good cop or bad cop?" Eric asked as he had Hypon were walking to Rouge's cell. "Personally, you should be the bad cop since it will throw off Rouge but it's up to you man."
1542.title: Rouge is too valuable, she will be questioned

choices: Hypon just got ready to write
15421.content:
Hypon however was silent to Eric, something that happened a lot after he helped change most of their old female friends and freedom fighters into girls without hesitation. Eric sighed at his friend's lack of communication but spoke out loud as they reached the prison for the females not yet assigned to males. "Fine, I'll do all the work. It's not like you're there for a reason. I just hoped you'd say something to her, she and I aren't on the best of conditions after that job I did on her..." He trailed off as they both remembered how he stole from Rouge by backstabbing her at her weakest, making their job more difficult

Those thoughts were interrupted as they descended down the stairs to the cells, passing a guard that was supposed to keep watch but was writing something instead, which Eric yelled at as per code of conduct. The guard then closed the book, which Hypon noticed was titled "The Gender War, Boy's edition" as he passed the guard by. After a walk and several of the changed girls offered them free sex for freedom, they made it to Rouge's cell which had a reinforced glass panel showing a kissed off white bat sitting crossed legged.

"You're late, too busy fucking our old friends boys?" A speaker on their side stated after Rouge spoke into a microphone on her end. "Ah, the dynamic duo, both criminals pretending to have a just cause for the wrong people. And here I was just enjoying my day when you have to come up and ruin it." Rouge then looked Eric in the eye and both he and her were just silent for a bit before Eric spoke.

"We have come to sell you a deal, providing you cooperate with the conditions." He spoke without breaking sight with Rouge, but Hypon saw a nervous twitch in one of his legs. "Give us your knowledge, and we will reward you handsomely."

"Will I get to leave?"

"No."

"Will I at least not be used as the local cocksleeve? I've been getting looks since I was put in this cell."

"Of course, unless you break the terms by lying to us or assisting the girls. Otherwise, your body is yours to use as you see fit."

"Better conditions?"

"We'll give you what we can, but this is your home until the war is over. No point arguing about it."

"What about what you owe me, Eric? To forgive your past transgressions? It might help sway my mind..." Rouge stated with a venomous look, which took Eric a bit to answer.

"Providing your information is true, yes, I will pay what I owe you. In full." Although Eric didn't look too keen about it, as it would no doubt get him in serious trouble with everyone.

Rouge however seemed pleased and stood up from her chair at the center of her cell room. "Good, glad we could talk fairly. By the way, before I was captured, I heard how Nicole had a little talk with Blaze about if you're possibly captured."

"Oh?" Eric stated as he paled at the idea of his ex's coming together to deal with him.

"Yeah, better not get captured, for your sake."

"Duly Noted."

Rouge then faced Hypon, who she ignored during the talk with eyes he remembered from the days where she ran her own club, like she was ready to play whatever game was in store for the future. "Care to note my info as I go through it dear? I remember you took better notes at interrogations than I did when we worked together after going clean from the AFF."
15421.title: Hypon is silent

154211.content:
"Time has changed, Rouge. I might still be taking notes at times, but I know how to lead an interrogation; I've learned from the best."

Hypon said all of this calmly but kept his eye contact with her face as he had his notepad ready and a recording device in his hand, ready to get all the info while also hearing what happened to one of his mentors and former ally.
154211.title: Hypon responds

choices: Stay and chat with Rouge for a bit
1542111.content:
Rouge then sat back down in her chair and crossed her legs again with a small frown as they went on to her information. Eric got up and placed a copy of a map and a marker into a bin that allowed them to give Rouge objects safely without going into her cell and watched as she got them out and placed them on the floor. "First, where are all girl operations that you know of." Rouge lazily flicked the marker over the map and marked areas that the boys knew and several they didn't. "Next, which one has Sally in it?"

Rouge this time frowned and looked up. "Acorn Palace, but she actively changes bases like she does her panties, so she could've moved on by now. Are you trying to capture her or kill her?"

"Capture, but Sonic has to decide what to do as punishment and frankly, she might want the choice of death from what rumors I heard." Eric said distastefully but got them back on track. "How about where boys of note are?"

"I think Silver is off in the old Freedom Fighter base in the desert, Big is in the palace, Vector is in Knothole with Charmy Bee. Those are the ones I know about, and don't be shocked to find them changed after my capture."

Eric slowly nodded and faced Hypon, who just finished taking notes. "I think that should be enough for now, we'll come back tomorrow for the rest." Eric then took the map from the bin and then put in a paper and pen. "Write what you want and we'll do our best to get what you want." Eric then started to walk away from the cell after giving Hypon a pat on the back, taking the map mostly likely to Sonic.
1542111.title: The Talk begins...

15421112.content: Hypon then sat in a nearby chair and then looked at Rouge, frowning as he pocketed his recording device, saying as he looked at her, "You and I both know that I wished this meeting was on better terms, Rouge. I know that you've probably been reading me as Eric asked his questions..."
15421112.title: Stay and chat with Rouge for a bit

154211121.content: Rouge looked at Hypon and shrugged, still sitting in her chair and not borthering with her list of wants yet to speak to Hypon. "You are still transparent, as usual. I honestly don't think this meeting could've been on better terms, with the war going on." Rouge then flicked some dust off of her jumpsuit and stood up to collect the list and pen. "Might as well start, though I bet you boys don't have half of what I need. I saw this coming a month ago after your tech 'hacked' our computers for our locations."
154211121.title: Next

choices: You know why I didn't run, Hypon
1542111211.content: Hypon just smiled slightly at his old partner and then said "Then why get caught, Rouge? The bat I knew never wanted to be the damsel in distress, locked up and waiting for her back up to save her. You could of moved to a different base or went under the radar, there are several bases that aren't very much in use by either side and I only know of three that are in use, either by the girls or anyone who seeks shelter from this war."
1542111211.title: So, why get caught?

15421112111.content: Rouge then looked up from her list with tired eyes and sighed before she looked at Hypon. "You know why I didn't run Hypon, and if you don't, you lost your edge and I feel sorry for you." Rouge then went back to the list and starred a few things that seemed to be important.
15421112111.title: You know why I didn't run, Hypon

154211121112.content: Hypon knew that Rouge was stubborn and that it did get her into trouble at times, but he knew that he could help Rouge while she was here and then added, "Rouge, I will try my best to get what you need from your list. I've made sure that each female gets what they need and feel comfortable while they are here; you won't be any different from them...
154211121112.title: Hypon changes the subject

1542111211122.content: Rouge looked back up at Hypon with a curious look. "May I ask why the extra assistance? You're not going to use those favors for something sexual, I hope? If so, you can forget it with me. I've had enough stares and groping to put me off sex for a long time, and I had business in it too." Rouge then finish her list, folded it up and slipped it into the bin with the pen, before she sat again and just stared at Hypon.
1542111211122.title: Rouge asks why...

choices: Rouge was surprised at Hypon's resolve
15421112111221.content: Hypon just smiled as he knew that would of come up with Rouge and then shook his head, "Its not about that, Rouge. And to be honest, I've been clean for a while. But I've always wanted to help people and I believe that even prisoners should be treated fairly and I've been named Warden of the Protected Care Sector for it, I alone have access to this area and I make sure that each person under my watch has all that they need to feel comfortable. If someone needs relief though, it does take me some time for me to put in a scheduled, but I don't abuse the people under my watch like the other wardens...trust me; its not fun when I get someone from another section who was abused and I try to help them...and plus, no one has asked me since Fiona was here...
15421112111221.title: It's not about that

154211121112211.content: Rouge looked rather impressed with Hypon's resolve to keep himself under control, since most boys would and did take advantage of the captured girls who were defenseless. However, Rouge was more intrigued by his last comment. "Fiona was here? Bet she was a load of fun to take care of." Rouge put this information in the back of her mind since the girls had lost Fiona's whereabouts but figure she was caught.
154211121112211.title: Rouge was surprised at Hypon's resolve

1542111211122111.content: Hypon then said, "You have no idea, but after her three attempts to escape, Sonic took her away from my hands and gave her to Tails as a little trophy. I would love to state my opinions on certain items like that, but let's just say that I don't agree with their methods and ideals of how they treat the woman here... Even the ones who we got back and couldn't change back..."
1542111211122111.title: You have no idea

15421112111221111.content: "At least you still stand with your convictions, not much has changed there has it Hypon.." Rouge nodded as she looked at her nails. " Fiona as Tails trophy though? I don't know if that boy really changed that much or Fiona was broken in enough to be less of a hassle. I'm not sure which is worse." Rouge then rubbed her eye and then looked back at Hypon. "As much fun as it is bargaining for my comforts in this cell and catching up, I'm tired. I had a very active day, some parts I wanted less, but now I think I'm rest for a while." Rouge then got up and stretched before she went to her bed which was not too far away, saying over her shoulder. "Don't forget my list, I'd hate to have my monthly without my things."
15421112111221111.title: Rouge understood his reasons

154211121112211112.content:
Several hours later...

Hypon was able to order the items on Rouge's list and made sure that they would make it to the base by Breakfast, hoping that a convey attack wouldn't occur in the middle of the night. Hypon, however, was away from his room near the maximum security containment area, but was sipping vodka in Tails' Workshop as Tail was working on a project as Fiona, dressed in a white lab jacket, black nerd glasses and her black collar, making Fiona's mind smarter than normal to keep up Tails' own intelligence...
154211121112211112.title: Later...

choices: The girls try to rescue Rouge
1542111211122111122.content: Rouge was staring at her ceiling as boys came and went, ogling her and a few even talking picture that she disliked to think what for. She disliked being on display not on her terms, even more since she had nothing to hide behind if she needed to change or to use the bathroom. Plus she was just plain bored and was running out of things to keep her busy, indulging herself only once when she gave the finger to a boy who tried to convince her to strip for him. She wanted a visitor soon, maybe one of her old friends or even a girl, slutty or normal, she was getting pretty desperate.
1542111211122111122.title: With Rouge...

choices: Hypon came down to see her
Eric came down to see her
15421112111221111222.content:
Rouge was completely bored with her cell after a few days of silence. She had explored every inch of her cell and even flew around to keep her wings active, but she was tired and bored. Eventually, she was watching outside of her cell, seeing the amount of boys trying to convince her to put on a show slowly die down until she had no one visit her. Occasionally the girls in the cells further out would go on a rant and it was somewhat amusing in a sad, no hope way.

Rouge tried to get visitors and even used the communicator to get one of the Boy's she knew wouldn't abuse her position to come down, even for a few minutes. Eventually...
15421112111221111222.title: A few days later

155.content: How about those who got changed by either side?
155.title: Not everyone got off easy...

1552.content:
Exactly 6 monthes into the gender war, the entire boy network was suddenly hit was massive trojan viruses that wiped every single base the boys owned and controlled. All computers, phones and even heavy turrets connected to the network were wiped and basic turn high tech to rocks and sticks. Then 2 weeks after the viruses hit, the Girls begin to take bases and boys by the dozens, as if they knew what had happened.

Needless to say, the boys were very interested with how this all seemed to happen and began to do research on what caused the first attack on the network, while one of their own quietly watched and waited, calculating how to proceed. It did not take long before this person was caught and thrown into the boys maximum security person for war criminals and prisoners.

3 months later
Eric was quietly sitting in his cell, which had nothing but a thin blanket and a thin pillow. He did not confirm or deny any of the charges against him and simply let others do what they will with him. He was free of any restraints but his robotic body was powered down for safety reasons.

And why was Eric sitting quietly in his cell instead of trying to escape or go mad like every single boy or girl in the prison. Simply put, he was waiting. Not for any person who could make things better, no, he was waiting for himself to do something. Waiting for that spark in his body that told him to stay or to fly. It sounds rather silly when explained, but he knew that he was not needed quite yet. So he waits, knowing he would not be executed in just a few days for treason, like his guards told him.
1552.title: The Traitor

choices: A few days later, when Eric wakes up
The war starts to spiral out of control
15523.content:
Eric was brought out into the execution yard where five boys were standing a few feet away from a wall that was full of bullet holes. The day before, Sonic and his lieutenants decided to have a firing squad for Eric's execution, since it would make a louder statement about traitors. Only one of the five had a real bullet, the rest had blanks that would sound just like the real one. Around the firing range, guards and boys alike watched as Eric was place in front of the wall at the mercy of the shooters. Eric looked up and saw that Sonic was watching as well as Shadow, Knuckles, Espio but the one who caught his attention was his brother Tails at Sonic's side.

Tails had grown up so much since the war started, now outmatching his older brother in both tech savy and combat, which made Eric a little proud despite the circumstances. Eric wished that Tails didn't see his execution, but in order for Tails to prove his loyalty to Sonic, he needed to watch his older brother die and continue to pledge allegiance for Sonic only.

Eric smiled as the group of boys raised their guns, waiting for them to fire but felt something surge out in himself, realizing that this was the moment he was waiting for. Behind his back, Eric quickly restarted his system and activated a new program to defend himself from fatal damage, although it would hurt like hell. Just as he finished, he realized Sonic made a speech about traitors and their punishment but Eric tuned it out while he worked, needing to concentrate. After Sonic's speech, Eric was given his chance to speech his last words, either to claim his innocence or to spite Sonic. However Eric did something quite different.

"I wonder... with my death, will the balance of this war finally reached a end, or intensify into more damage than it has already done? Some day Sonic, you and Sally will look back at this war and will realized how much you both have destroyed. I just hope you feel proud of yourself to kill a fellow friend in cold blood for doing the right thing." Eric stated to the boys watching before he was silent.

Without hesitation or remorse, all five boys aimed and fired their guns at Sonic's word.

However, the damage wasn't fatal as the bullet lodged in Eric's heart, although it looked and felt so with the blood spraying out of the wound. In truth though, Eric's body had already started repairing the damage with scrape parts his body had prepared along with making new blood cells in his body, but to all who watched, he was shot and it looked fatal as could be. Despite the convincing appearance, Eric also induced a near death coma that put him out and made his death believable to the touch and sight since they would check his pulse so see if he was still alive.

........

Meanwhile, a boy stepped over to Eric's limp body and checked his pulse, to find none and declared so to Sonic and the crowd. From that point, boys started to leave as the body was pulled into the morgue, all convinced that the two tailed Fox was dead.
15523.title: An unfortunate series of events...

155231.content: Three Days after the events of Eric's Execution, Eric began to stir, but not in any place he would remember being. It was quiet and dark. As Eric moved, he felt a quick surge of pain enter from laying on a hard table and quickly heard the sound of a rocking chair, creaking as it rocked.. "You finally woke up...You are one lucky bastard, Eric." Eric heard these words and looked towards the source of the comment and saw a very shaggy wolf who was sitting in the wooden rocker near a warm fireplace... "Welcome back to the world of the living.."
155231.title: A turn for better or worse...?

1552311.content: Eric was confused and looked around, expecting to be in a coffin instead of this home of the shaggy wolf. "Not to be rude, but where exactly am I?" Eric quietly readied himself to run as the wolf could be on the boy's side, tricking him.
1552311.title: Eric askes where he is

choices: The wolf is quiet at first, then tells him
1552312.content: Eric was hesitant to be face to face with the shaggy wolf since he completely expected to be alone when he woke up. However, seeing as he was taking up the wolf's table and was obviously taken care of during his coma-like state, it seemed he had to get over it. "You have me at a disadvantage, you know my name, but I am afraid I don't know yours..."
1552312.title: Eric asked who he was

15523122.content:
The wolf was quiet and stopped rocking for a moment until he finally got up and turned on a nearby lamp, beginning to speak.

"I was once known as a warrior. A fighter for freedom and justice. I was one of very few who were deemed "the best." However, that all changed after this damn war.. I was deemed an outsider, a traitor to my own gender and choose to leave my very post with dignity and my only pride I had.. I am nobody; who are you? Are you nobody too?" The wolf stopped there and then lifted up an old picture frame that was covered in dust and revealed an old friend with a little bunny and her mother, long gone from the effects of the war...
15523122.title: The Exile

choices: Where do you think your going?
155231221.content: Eric got up from the table and checked his wound. "To the boys, no, I am dead. I guess that is who I am now." After finding his wound to be properly managed, he went over his robot systems. "Well this has been enlightening, but if this is all, I will take my leave. Thank you for keeping me out of the ground, but I should leave Mobius before my good fortune wears out."
155231221.title: Next

155232.content:
From that point, the war got much more rough and sanity was little too late. Upon seeing the body of Eric Prower through the official channels, the Girls were worked into a frenzy to stop Sonic, believing that he would kill more boys or even fellow girls in his madness. The war was no longer orderly, now it was a free for all, with real guns included instead of the gender change laser guns. Bases were taken with several hundreds of innocent citizens were injured beyond repair in the battlefields.

However, as far as actually controlling the tide, Sonic was holding more control. He managed to keep more bases and held an army of boys, changed and normal, that towered over Sally's once even side. Sonic had become a dictator, his word was law and if any opposed him, they would be controlled or changed into a foot soldier.
155232.title: The war starts to spiral out of control

choices: Meanwhile, at the old Prower home...
1552322.content:
Sally was examining a map of bases over an environment background to find anything to recover their bases and to beat Sonic back. Besides her was her body guard Frost Lynn, Amy Rose and Rouge the Bat who was actually above them sitting on a structure arch. Tension was high and patience for failure was minimal, two soldiers demoted after failing a stakeout on their old headquarters Knothole. They were now underground, hidden under a free market that had trade goods and black market deals, constantly alert.

"Now, we could come from above, climb the thicker trees to the south and drop in during the night..." Sally thought aloud.

" No, our last report stated they had guards on top with riles, we wouldn't get five feet before they would blow our heads open." Amy stated bluntly and crossed out the spot on the map. "Maybe underground, if we dug several meters away on the east, and had a distraction, we could get inside."

Sally and Amy talked back and forth on strategy while Frost made sure they were safe, knowing Rouge was watching her more than anyone. Since stress was high, so was the need for comfort equally high, and they all knew that their needs to relaxwould eventually take over safety. Frost had put them in danger when she tried to meet with a source who claimed to have a way to end the war, only to be an ambush that took away several good female soldiers, since then, everything was suspicious.

Rouge was thinking about her club and the girls who worked for her taken away against their will. She was on a vendetta, to get back at all who had a hand on the attack that took her workers and destroyed her business. She knew Shadow was there along with Knuckles, but she had more work to do. She was also extremely tired of cleaning her white fur that had turned grey from the dirt and dust, since it made little difference without running water to get out the grey.
1552322.title: Meanwhile with the Girl base

15523222.content:
Eric felt himself pull out of his self-induced coma and found himself laying down somewhere in a dark confined place. Assuming he was in the morgue in a tray table cooler, he tested above his head and below his feet for the door and instead found the smooth polish of wood. Immediately realizing where he was, he turned on his robotic side and looked at his robotic arm while laying on his side on a very comfortable bed

Apparently the timer had him three weeks after he was shot and as such his body felt weak and his battery was lower than he was comfortable with. He should've put in an alarm, but he didn't act until too late, so nothing could've changed. Eric checked which direction was up and spat to find it dropped to his feet, marking his position upright and sweet fresh air was above his head, six feet high.

He felt himself frown and crouched down after his body figured out it's position to wind up his legs for a jump to would loosen the wood above him with his outstretched fist. It hurt and Eric was sure to have a few splinters but he loosened the wood enough to get a face full of soil that started to fill in the empty space. Without wasting a moment's notice, Eric clawed at the soft dirt and pulled himself up with whatever roots or solid soil he could find.

****

Eric broke through the surface and gasped at clean air before he pulled himself out of his hole with what energy he had left. He just gasped for a while, breathing in and out to ease his air lacking lungs' torment, but slowly looked around. He then saw where he was and felt a tightness in his chest as he looked at the ruin of the Prower home, damaged with neglect and looted by both sides. He then looked and saw the graves of his family's ancestors before seeing his own.

"Here lies Eric F. Prower, paid for his crimes with his life. RIP'"


"Huh." Eric said dryly as he wiped the dirt from his body, seeing for the first time that he was wearing a suit that was deeply stained with the dirt. "Not today it seems."

He slowly got up and wobbled into the home he once knew as his body was too weak to do much else. He searched for some canned goods and found some soups, frowning since he had little else but cracked open each can regardless, he wasn't going to pass up food after his ordeal. Food came first then recharging, before Eric would even begin to think of his next step.
15523222.title: Six feet under, and too stuborn to quit

choices: Tails, stand with the Girls and fight
155232222.content:
Once he was at a comfortable charge, as well as a partly filled belly and some sleep, Eric felt better. He often checked where the bullet had hit him and to the untrained eye, it was as if nothing was there, except for a small circle wound in his chest. He checked his body and felt some small stiffness from the wound but otherwise he was more than fine. He was lucky, and next time, the shot would be between his eyes if he didn't think smart.

Eric sat in his old room, in a chair from his past that he managed to fit in as he thought deeply about his next move, weighting all options. He could never return to the Boy bases, or risk another trial. An option that came quickly was to go to the girls side and provide support, a valid choice, if not for facing his ex's and the girls he had a hand in changing. Plus, they might force him to change his sex, which was a major issue as he had enough altering of his orginal body for one lifetime.

Another less apealing option was to leave Mobius, let the two fight it out and go live out his life somewhere else. He had already worked to gain the friends he had, he wasn't going to stab them in the back and run. Yet he could start fresh, maybe meet new people and stay away from crazy shit until he was too old to go fight in it. Eric quickly shook his head, dismissing the thought as he knew he would just change the context of the situations and there was no guarantee he wouldn't be hunted once his grave was found empty.

So he knew that he had to pick a side, just like before, but this time no machine was whispering in his head, telling him what to do. Cynthia was removed from his hardware once he was arrested for treason, taking away one of his comforts in life just to spite him. Robotnik's brainwashing was a distant memory as he broke free and could do what he wanted but even then everyone had trouble accepting the enemy as a friend. Especially a former rouge double agent, who turned his back on his friends in order to nearly get them all robotized. But he lived by chance, and his future was never cut and dry, so pulled out a coin that he carried for luck to flip for it. Heads he would head out to escape the war, while tails he would seek Sally and beg for protection in exchange for service.

Eric rested his head on his head that held the coin and spoke softly to it, and to the string of fate that connected them. "Lady Fate, give me the direction to put my life towards. Grant that my feet by quick, my tongue sharp, and my hands steathy. And if the worst comes to pass, grant that my friends and family find the peace I will not receive." He then flick the coin high into the air, watching it flip as the world slowed down around him as the coin was snatched from the air and slammed onto the table nearby. Eric took a second before he lifted his hand and saw...
155232222.title: The next day

choices: Eric chooses his identity and heads off
Eric decides to repair his home and make it headquarters
1552322221.content:
Eric stared at his coin in complete silence, seeing the head side clearly, telling him to run away from his home and leave the war up to Sonic and Sally. He felt his heart drop as he knew that this course would lead to more destruction and chaos, and possibly more lives lost other than what he was to be. Eric saw the faces of his friends flash through his mind, his time with them, and what they had built together, and clenched his fist in rage.

"Fuck this." He thought as he went against what had had lead him more than half his life.

Eric picked up his coin and tossed it aside to the floor as he moved outside his home to the forest, his determination clear on his face as he scanned the tree line. He wasn't going to leave his friends, no matter what fate had in plan. He would fight as a rebel to the war, removing both Sally and Sonic from power in order to make peace for all of Mobius, a third side that was opposed to the whole war in general. He would bring back the Freedom Fighters, with their last mission to bring back freedom for all boys and girls from this war that divided them.

With his mind made up, Eric then pulled up a map of Mobius and set points where he would find those who would fight with him. He would need an army of his own, and he knew just where to look and who to fight with him, but feared for his brother's sake. If he lead an army, Sonic would go to Tails and hold him against Eric, so he needed a new identity. Something the reminded his friends of the past, but kept Tails safe from harm. Eric then glanced back at his home, his mind buzzing with how to continue.
1552322221.title: Spitting in Fate's face, a choice is made

choices: Surrendered, he was going to go to Sally anyway
Hide, take his chances of not being seen
1552322222.content:
Eric raised his hand and saw the other side of the coin stare him in his face, then with no emotion he took the coin from the table and stood up. "It's a while until I hit Girl territory" Eric spoke softly to himself as he set a waypoint to Knothole, several miles away from his home and started off, but stopped outside his home at his grave. He didn't feel right about leaving the grave open so he spent some time to put it back so it looked as normal as it could be to tend to his own grave. Eventually he left his family's home and ancestors to meet with the leader of the Girl's side he claimed to want to destroy, hoping his father's old silver hooded cloak would be enough to hide himself to unwanted attention before he arrived.

****

He walked for at least several hours as he felt himself hum a nursery rhyme as he continued into the forest. Eric already felt sore as his muscles were not as strong as they were before his fake death and the long rest only made them stiffer. He looked around for a stream or a river to rest by when he found a lake several sizes of his home, with a deep blue that seemed divine for drinking at. However, he did not remember a lake here previously, so his guard was up and he carefully hide to watch his surroundings for signs of a trap. Slowly, he picked out three figures hiding around the lake in trees, but he could not figure out if they were women or part of the boys so he kept quiet. However, he focus went to the lake again as it seemed he was not the only one who found it...

A big purple cat fell out of the brush on the opposite side of the lake, clawing at the ground in order to get to the water, as from a distance he seemed in a bad way. It took Eric a second to recognize Big the cat from his huge ears and bigger waistband, and felt himself twitch to go and help him, but held himself back as he knew what would happen. Sure enough, once Big got close enough to the water, he put his hand through and began drinking heavily from the water and the three forms dropped from above and closed in on him. "Run Big, they're almost on you!" Eric screamed in his mind but he knew he would only cause more problems, as much as he wanted to help, his own safety was a concern as he was not nearly well enough for a three against one.

Eric suddenly noticed Big wasn't moving as much and almost immediately aimed himself to try and help when he saw that Big had fallen asleep with his hand still in the water. Even more, he noted the figures who were around Big and felt his stomach knot as he recognized each one and knew he stood little chance against them. Amy Hedgehog, Bunny Rabot, and Blaze the Cat stood around the sleeping Big as they pulled his head away from the water, speaking to each other. "Good thing Cream wasn't here, she would've made a huge fuss about seeing Big again like this." Amy spoke as he prevous pink dress was replaced with a black steath suit along with the others, pushing back her hair as she looked at Big. "Sorry big guy, but we have orders. I'll try to keep you happy until we have to change you."

"Amy, a little more help here sugar?" Bunny grunted as she moved the large cat, her robot bits doing most of the work. Amy quickly realized her distraction and went back to pulling Big's arm while Bunny did his legs and Blaze did his shoulders.

"Did you have to be so hard on him Blaze?" Amy asked between pulls to a moody Blaze, who just closed her eyes and looked away with an annoyed look. "I mean, he just wanted help finding his frog. And he has no weapon on him, you went a little overboard."

"Be quiet, he is a boy and an enemy to our side." Blaze spoke coldly as she snarled at Amy, who just shrugged it off. "At least he drank the water and knocked himself out, but now we have to lug him around until it wears off, my method would have him up in mintues."

"With less brain cells and more broken bones." Bunny edged in before they all stopped and put down the giant cat, stretching out. "He'd still be limping and we'd still be at this speed."

"Whatever." Blaze repiled curtly before she crossed her arms, but immediately turned to face the lake, almost as if she knew where her ex was currently hiding.

Eric flattened himself to the ground the second Blaze swung her gaze his way as he did not in any way want to fight the ex-girlfriend who nearly killed him when they broke up before the war. He put a hand over his mouth just in case her sharp ears could reach beyond the lake, mentally cursing at his misfortune to bump into her in such a quiet area where she could take him out and not even worry about others backing him up.

"Blaze, we need a hand here." Amy grunted as the two of them were struggling to move Big with Blaze. However, Bunny noticed Blaze gaze around the lake and readied her ray gun to stun or change whoever might be hidden in the trees. "What's up girl?" She spoke quietly, but not enough for Eric's robotic ear.

"I thought I saw something in the trees over there."

"Another boy?" Amy suddenly got interested and put down Big as she readied her own weapon, a hammer she cared deeply for.

"Can't tell for sure, it looked silver." Blaze answered before she turned her body to face Eric's spot, ready to go over and check for herself, her claws extended as she prepared for a dirty fight. "Wait here, I'll just be a second."

Eric felt his body go into overdrive as he really did not want to be Blaze's punching bag again, even though they worked for Sally who he wanted to see, he didn't think it was worth it to roll the dice with his chances. Yet Blaze was a predator, if she had something in her eyes, she would follow it to the end of the map and do whatever she wanted at the end of the hunt. He spent most of the first bits of war in the base in fear that he would be spotted by Blaze or Nicole and forced to fight them. Even after all the hell they put him through, he still cared deeply for them and really did not want to harm them, despite past circumstances that he was forced into doing. In the end, he took a breath and...
1552322222.title: Off to a terrible start...

choices: Puts on the collar and goes with the girls
Refuses, and they are suddenly attacked by passing boys
15523222221.content:
Eric gritted his teeth as he made his choice to give in and show himself to the girls, despite his own personal feelings begging him to keep quiet. He slowly rose from his spot to the quick attention of the three women, each ready to chase or attack him. He slowly raised his hands from his sides and made his way over to them, going around their lake slowly as not to spark any attacks. Once he got within range of Bunnie's femminizer gun, he stopped as Blaze and Amy walked up, keeping his face down as his hood still covered his face and his cloak hid his body.

"State your business!" Blaze demanded as she had her claws out and was prepared to fight as hard as possible while Amy backed her up. "Are you boy or girl?"

"Boy." Eric replied straightforwardly, but held his tongue as he noticed a sudden interest from Blaze focused on him, almost like she was trying to place him.

"She asked you a question boy!" Amy yelled as she did not notice her friend, but had her attention on Eric. "What are you doing here? Are you here to rescue Big, or did Sonic send you here to take us to him? Answer us!"

"Neither." Eric answered wholeheartedly, glancing towards the sleeping giant with a pain of regret as he did hope he was alright. "In truth, I was actually surprised to see him, and the three of you. Let's just say I want to go see Sally."

Bunnie was surprised at the figure's words as she kept him in her crosshair. "No boy is insane enough to face Sally! Ya'd have to have a hole in ya head to be so stupid."

"I don't know about a hole in my head..." Eric answered back with a hidden chuckle just Blaze was a few steps from his face, her eyes staring at him as her hand slowly went up to move his hood back. "But I used to have a hole in my heart, does that count?"

"Smartass." Blaze commented as she grabbed his hood, staring into his eyes before her eyes widen as she saw past the shadow hiding him from her and yanked the hood off with all her force.

All three women were shocked to see Eric's face staring back at them once Blaze had flipped his hood back, seeing their old friend and once enemy who they thought was killed, come back from the grave. Blaze noticed the dirt stained state of what looked like the suit he was buried in and it only added to their shock, making Eric wonder silently if he was going to see this for every one of his old friends.

His thoughts however were suddenly interupted by a solid slap to his face from his ex. "I suppose I deserved that..." Eric spoke just before he got a hard kneeling to his gut which made his gunshot wound burn, barely letting out a gasp before he talked again. "And that..."

"I THOUGHT YOU WERE DEAD!" Blaze screamed out at him, lashing out like he expected her to with some punches as well. "Three weeks after we watched you get shot on some god-damn camera feed! Three weeks, and only now you dare come back you bastard!" Amy and Bunnie slowly went over to try and get Blaze to stop hitting her ex but were stopped by Eric's hand gesturing them to stop.

"I'm sorry Blaze. I put myself in a near-death coma on the spot, I didn't plan on being back. I can't imagine what kind of pain that put you through to see that happen." Eric spoke through the beating Blaze gave him, trying to cover his delicate bits when she immediately turned away and crossed her arm with a huff. Eric slowly got up and made sure to keep his distance as he knew she could easily pump out more rage if she wanted to, bumping into Amy before moving back.

"I dunno, seems a little far-fetched." Amy commented with a frown as she put her hands on her sides. "How do we know you're the real one and not a fraud?"

"Cus' I took your wallet right now."

Amy felt her front pocket and glared at Eric until he showed her own wallet, grabbing it from his hands as he smirked a little bit. "Alright, not bad, but Eric was more then a thief."

"How about the fact that of the three of you girls, Bunnie and Blaze were hit on by me while I was first going into the Freedom Fighters? And during which, I helped Bunnie figure out another feature of her own system."

Amy glanced over to Bunnie, who shrugged before she lower her gun and faced Eric, a little warmer than before. "He's not a sucessful flirter, though the advice made the fight a little easier. How are ya doing sugar?"

"I as good as can be from climbing out of my own grave, but seriously, I need to see Sally." Eric rubbed the back of his head as he looked at Big who was still out cold. "Only she can protect me from Sonic, and trust me when I say I have a lot to offer her."

Bunnie however slinged the femminizer gun over her shoulder and frowned. "Not likely, she's not exactly in the most trusting mood lately. Not since we nearly lost all of our bases to the boys, even Knothole is gone."

This got Eric's attention as he had only remembered news that they were taking advantage of his gift. "What!? Then how do you expect to take on Sonic?! I figured you lose a few to fights, but nearly all the bases including Knothole?! How many troops do you have? How many bases?"

"Sonic has been hitting us harder than ever." Blaze stated finally, uncrossing her arms from her chest. "Your 'death' seemed to push him to doing more aginst us. We only have two bases, and about 200 spread out girls over Mobius in boy territory and about another 100 in each base. We're all doing our best, but the deck is stacked heavily against us."

Eric then stood forward and outstretched his arms to his former friends. "Then let me be your wild card. Sonic and his boys don't know I'm alive, I know their bases and their security, plus I know their strengths. I can help Sally and the girls win this, although it will be tough with so few girls..."

The three looked a little unsure about bringing Eric with them, so they quietly moved into a group to talk it out, leaving him to wonder what was being said. Eventually, after much debate, they all faced Eric with varying amount of concern to seriousness.

"We have decided you can go see Sally, in exchange, you help us lift Big out of here and you follow our every direction to there. Do we have a deal?" Amy told Eric as she held out a pink collar, something that put his nerves on edge as she went towards him. "Rule one, we need to know that you are telling the truth and where you are, so you have to wear our... prisoner collar. Just as a precaution."

Eric knew about the collars as they basically made whoever wore them more inclined to state the truth with a mixture of a tube of drugs and a eletric current that gave their head a 5000 volt shock. They also kept a heartbeat monitor so they knew if you were alive and lock that could only be removed by voice code, something even he had doubts of being able to get free. Yet he knew if he rejected, Sally would never agree, and he would be stuck at step one while the boys found and corrected their troublemaker. With a sigh of defeat, Eric slowly...
15523222221.title: Surrendered, he was going to go to Sally anyway

info.description:
This is a spinoff to Dawson's story. I give him credit for the idea.
After the time of Eggman, The girls get angry and refuse to deal with the boys any longer and decide to make them Girls. The Boys however, now have a reason to make the Girls there obienent servants. Who shall win?

RULES
All main characthers are in the story, I'll allow a few OC's.
Boy engineer is Tails and the Girl is Marine or Nicole.
Sex is allowed.
No Eating people.
Blood is allowed, but no death.
I'll add other rules later
Have Fun.
